title: The Shawshank Redemption
overview: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: Inception
overview: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea.

title: The Dark Knight
overview: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc on Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest tests.

title: Pulp Fiction
overview: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: Forrest Gump
overview: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

title: Interstellar
overview: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Matrix
overview: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Goodfellas
overview: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
overview: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam.

title: Fight Club
overview: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club.

title: Star Wars: Episode V
overview: After the Rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
overview: A young FBI cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer.

title: Schindler's List
overview: In German-occupied Poland, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce.

title: Parasite
overview: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

title: La La Land
overview: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations.

title: Toy Story
overview: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.
